name: constantinople-1283-removed
comment: Hardfork with new instructions and protocol changes

sstoreSet.d: Once per SSTORE operation if the zeroness changes from zero

sstoreReset.d: Once per SSTORE operation if the zeroness does not change from zero

sstoreRefund.d: Once per SSTORE operation if the zeroness changes to zero

minerReward.d: The amount a miner gets rewarded for mining a block
